mapper.insert: /* insertMember */ INSERT INTO ally_mbr ( login_id, sex, age_grp, co_no ) VALUES ( #{loginID}, #{sex}, #{ageGroup}, #{companyNo} )
/* insertMemberEmailCertificationInfo */ INSERT INTO ally_mbr_email_crt ( email_addr, crt_cd, crt_cd_isue_ymdt ) VALUES ( #{loginID}, #{certificationCode}, SYSDATETIME )
mapper.update: /* updateMemberEmailCertificationInfo */ UPDATE ally_mbr_email_crt SET email_addr = #{loginID}, crt_cd = #{certificationCode}, crt_cd_isue_ymdt = SYSDATETIME WHERE email_addr = #{loginID}
mapper.select: /* selectCompanyList */ SELECT co_no, co_nm, (SELECT COUNT(dmn_nm) FROM ally_co_email_dmn WHERE co_no = co.co_no) AS dmn_cnt FROM ally_co co
